definition: Jing, one of the 28 constellations of Chinese astronomy/surname Jing

sentences.english: Varying working condition of deep-well water source heat pump are obtained by experiment simulation.
sentences.chinese: 通过实验模拟了深井水源热泵制热变工况运行。

sentences.english: By the first century BC the Chinese had developed the technology for deep drilling boreholes.
sentences.chinese: 公元前一世纪，中国人已经发明了深井钻探技术。

sentences.english: Love is drowning in a deep well.
They soon found a deep well.
sentences.chinese: 他们很快发现一口深井。

sentences.english: Rockburst is one of the disasters in the course of deep deposit exploitation.
sentences.chinese: 岩爆是深井开采中的主要灾害之一。

sentences.english: At the end point Sham Tseng, you may take mini bus to Tsuen Wan MTR Station.
sentences.chinese: 终点为深井，可在青龙头青山公路乘车往荃湾或屯门。

sentences.english: A brief history of development of deep well pump was reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 一个简短的历史，深井泵的发展进行了审查。

sentences.english: Therefore, a new way to improve the stability of the motor for down hole pump is found out.
sentences.chinese: 从而指出了改善深井潜水泵用马达稳定性的一种途径。

sentences.english: And very often the water used comes from deep wells.
sentences.chinese: 而灌溉所使用的水，常常来自于深井中。

sentences.english: The ship anchors and so on building's outer wall services, the clean paint, the deep well work and so on.
sentences.chinese: 船泊等建筑物的外壁维修，清洗油漆，深井作业等。

sentences.english: Water from deep well is directed to thirsty cattle and parched crops .
sentences.chinese: 深井里的水输送给干渴的家畜和焦干的庄稼。

sentences.english: Wherever fluids are injected into deep wells, that is a risk.
sentences.chinese: 每一处被液体注入的深井都有风险。

sentences.english: Aplication results indicated that deep well dewatering is safety and economical.
sentences.chinese: 应用效果表明，利用深井降水是安全经济的。

sentences.english: As if she had fallen into a well.
sentences.chinese: 她好像掉在一口深井里。

sentences.english: The method of heating oil with the earth thermal energy self-balance is suitable for the deep oil wells with large production.
sentences.chinese: 地热能自平衡加热原油的方式适合于产液量大的深井。

definition: Jing, one of the 28 constellations of Chinese astronomy/surname Jing
vertical shaft (for mining, ventilation systems etc)
mouth of a spring or fountain
so deep one cannot see to the bottom/limitless
